thread.title: $99+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air
thread.title_full: $99+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air

title: $99+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $99+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air $99+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - July 15, 2015 at 6:11 PM Tweet 
These extremely affordable fares to Europe—as low as $99 from the U.S. to Amsterdam, Dublin, or Paris on Iceland-based Wow Air—were just announced. 
Good news, bad news: The good news is that the advertised rates starting at $99 to Amsterdam, Dublin, or Paris; $186 to Reykjavik; $198 to London; and $206 for Berlin or Copenhagen, are readily available. The bad news is threefold: 1) Wow Air only currently serves Boston (BOS) and Washington, D.C./Baltimore (BWI); the return rates are higher, though not enough to thwart a cost-conscious traveler; and the various ancillary fees will get you, though not enough to nullify any airfare savings. Check out the extremely affordable rates we found on Wow Air, peppered throughout various days this fall, mostly during October - January: Boston, MA to Amsterdam, Netherlands for $99 O/W Washington, D.C., to Amsterdam, Netherlands for $99 O/W Boston, MA to Paris, France for $99 O/W Washington, D.C., to Paris, France for $99 O/W Boston, MA to Dublin, Ireland for $99 O/W Washington, D.C., to Reykjavik, Iceland for $186 O/W Boston, MA to Reykjavik, Iceland for $194 O/W Washington, D.C., to London, England for $199 O/W Washington, D.C., to Berlin, Germany for $206 O/W Boston, MA to London, England for $212 O/W Boston, MA to to Copenhagen, Denmark for $242 O/W Find Cheap Flights!
